net.sf.jclal.activelearning.scenario

Class StreamBasedSelectiveSamplingScenario

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.scenario.AbstractScenario
      • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.scenario.StreamBasedSelectiveSamplingScenario
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, IConfigure, IScenario, JCLAL

    public class StreamBasedSelectiveSamplingScenario
extends AbstractScenario
    Implementation of Stream-Based Sampling scenario. This scenario is sometimes called sequential active.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Eduardo Perez Perdomo
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • getThreshold

        public double getThreshold()
        Get the threshold
        Returns:
        The threshold used when the scenario is stream.

      • setThreshold

        public void setThreshold(double threshold)
        Set the threshold
        Parameters:
        threshold - The threshold used when the scenario is stream.

      • instancesSelection

        public void instancesSelection()
        Select the most informative instances according to the scenario, the query strategy and the batch mode. Stores the selected indexes of the instances in the query strategy.
